val.en_US: Call Us to Arrange a Meeting

Adopt A Pet is a Santa Clara Bay Area pet rescue organization run by a group of dedicated volunteers. We rescue pets in need and give them shelter and take care of them until we can find them a loving home to go to. Are you looking for a new addition to your family? Contact us now!
We have had an amazing year in 2016, saving the lives of over 700 dogs! From taking in 70 dogs in a Fresno hoarding case â€¦
